cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.4)

project("GuitarAmpPlugin")


list(APPEND CMAKE_MODULE_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../FRUT/prefix/FRUT/cmake")
include(Reprojucer)


set(GuitarAmpPlugin_jucer_FILE
  "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/GuitarAmpPlugin.jucer"
)


set(JUCE_MODULES_GLOBAL_PATH "../JUCE/modules")

  JUCER_FORMAT_VERSION "1"
  PROJECT_FILE "${GuitarAmpPlugin_jucer_FILE}"
  PROJECT_ID "UoTb9Y"
)

jucer_project_settings(
  PROJECT_NAME "GuitarAmpPlugin"
  PROJECT_VERSION "1.0.0"
  COMPANY_NAME "LL"
  USE_GLOBAL_APPCONFIG_HEADER OFF
  ADD_USING_NAMESPACE_JUCE_TO_JUCE_HEADER OFF

)
